roleset.name: cause to be tangled (in something)

example.name: entangle-v: traceless passive
example.text: Warner and Sony are entangled in a legal battle over movie producers Peter Gruber and Jon Peters.
example.arg: in a legal battle over movie producers Peter Gruber and Jon Peters.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Warner and Sony are entangled in a legal battle over movie producers Peter Gruber and Jon Peters .
example.arg: in a legal battle over movie producers Peter Gruber and Jon Peters

example.name: entangled-j
example.text: Now Guizhentang is quite entangled -- their enterprise is legitimate , their business is lawful , extracting bear bile from live bears is not illegal , but sooner or later they will be overwhelmed , facing the spittle flying all over the sky .

roleset.note: ENTANGLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'entangle' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'entangled' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2, fill-9.8. (from entangle.01-v)
ENTANGLED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from entangled.01-j)
